get.description: Retrieves comprehensive call statistics including incoming/outgoing calls, video/audio breakdown, and per-chat call counts. Uses server-side filtering for optimal performance. Supports pagination via limit parameter (default: 1000, max: 10000).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of calls to analyze (default: 1000, max: 10000)

parameters.name: includeCallLog
parameters.description: If true, each chat in the response includes a callLog array with per-call details (messageId, date, duration, video, outgoing). Default: false.

chats.description: Per-chat call summary with identity, call stats, media counts, and call log

get.summary: Get call log statistics with enhanced filtering

post.description: Send a photo or file to a chat. Maximum file size is 100MB. Supports images, videos, and documents.

parameters.name: mobile
parameters.description: Mobile number of the Telegram account

400.description: Invalid request - file too large, invalid URL, or missing required fields

500.description: Failed to send media - check Telegram connection or file accessibility

get.description: Download or preview media from a Telegram message. Images and videos preview in browser, other files download. Supports HTTP Range requests for video streaming.

parameters.name: mobile
parameters.description: Mobile number of the Telegram account

parameters.name: chatId
parameters.description: Chat ID or username. Use "me" for saved messages, channel username (e.g., "channelname"), or numeric ID

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: Message ID containing the media (must be a positive number)

200.description: Media file (preview in browser for images/videos, download for other types)

206.description: Partial content (when using Range header for video streaming)

304.description: Not modified (when using If-None-Match header for caching)

404.description: Media not found - message ID does not exist or message has no media

416.description: Range not satisfiable - invalid Range header

get.summary: Preview or download media from a message

get.description: Get thumbnail image for a Telegram message containing media (photo or video). Returns JPEG image. Supports caching with ETag headers.

parameters.name: mobile
parameters.description: Mobile number of the Telegram account

parameters.name: chatId
parameters.description: Chat ID or username. Use "me" for saved messages, channel username (e.g., "channelname"), or numeric ID

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: Message ID containing the media (must be a positive number)

304.description: Not modified (when using If-None-Match header for caching)

404.description: Thumbnail not found - message ID does not exist, message has no media, or thumbnail is not available

get.summary: Get thumbnail for a media message

post.description: Send multiple media files as an album. If some items fail, the operation continues and returns a summary of successful and failed items.

parameters.name: mobile
parameters.description: Mobile number of the Telegram account

200.description: Album sent with summary of results

errors.description: Details of failed items (only present if failed > 0)

400.description: Invalid request - empty album, invalid URLs, or file size exceeds limit

500.description: Failed to send album - all items failed or Telegram connection error

get.description: Retrieve metadata for media messages in a chat. Supports filtering by type, date range, and message ID range. Use maxId for pagination (get messages with ID less than maxId).

parameters.name: mobile
parameters.description: Mobile number of the Telegram account

parameters.name: chatId
parameters.description: Chat ID or username. Use "me" for saved messages, channel username, or numeric ID

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date for filtering (ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss)

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date for filtering (ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of messages to fetch (default: 50, max: 1000)

parameters.name: maxId
parameters.description: Maximum message ID to include (use for pagination - get messages with ID less than this. Use nextMaxId from previous response for next page)

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: Filter by media types. Use "all" to get all types grouped by type. If not specified, returns all media types.

400.description: Invalid request - invalid date format, chat ID, or limit value

get.summary: Get media metadata from a chat

get.description: Get filtered list of media messages with detailed metadata including thumbnails. Returns standardized paginated response. Use maxId for pagination (get messages with ID less than maxId).

parameters.name: mobile
parameters.description: Mobile number of the Telegram account

parameters.name: chatId
parameters.description: Chat ID or username. Use "me" for saved messages, channel username, or numeric ID

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Filter media after this date (ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss)

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Filter media before this date (ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of media items to fetch (default: 50, max: 1000)

parameters.name: maxId
parameters.description: Maximum message ID to include (use for pagination - get messages with ID less than this. Use nextMaxId from previous response for next page)

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: Filter by media types. Use "all" to get all types grouped by type. If not specified, returns all media types.

200.description: Paginated media response with standardized format

400.description: Invalid request - invalid date format, chat ID, or limit value

get.description: Retrieves top private chats ranked by engagement score using advanced filtering. Uses time-decay scoring, conversation patterns, and dialog metadata for accurate results. parameters.description: Maximum number of top chats to return (default: 10, min: 1, max: 50)
